i1.name: The Relentless Storm
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Volibear''' gains a [[stack]] of ''The Relentless Storm'' for 6 seconds whenever he damages at least one enemy with a [[basic attack]] or [[champion ability|ability]], stacking up to 5 times, with the duration refreshing on subsequent damaging attacks and abilities. At 5 stacks, '''Volibear''' gains ''Lightning Claws''.

{{sbc|The Relentless Storm:}} '''Volibear''' gains {{sti|attack speed|{{as|5%|attack speed}} {{as|(+ 4% per 100 AP)}} {{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} per stack, up to {{as|25%|attack speed}} {{as|(+ 20% per 100 AP)}}.

{{sbc|Lightning Claws:}} '''Volibear's''' claws ignite with lightning, causing his basic attacks {{tip|on-hit}} to deal {{as|{{pp|10+1*x for 3; then + 2*x for 3; then + 3*x for 7; then + 4*x|formula=10+1 per level until lvl 3, then+2 until lvl 6, then+3 per level until lvl 13, then+4 per level}} {{as|(+ 40% AP)}} '''bonus''' magic damage|magic damage}} to the target and the closest {{tip|sight|visible}} enemy within 450 units of the target, chaining up to 4 subsequent targets.
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Volibear gains a stack of The Relentless Storm for 6 seconds whenever he damages at least one enemy with a basic attack or champion ability, stacking up to 5 times, with the duration refreshing on subsequent damaging attacks and abilities. At 5 stacks, Volibear gains Lightning Claws.
The Relentless Storm: Volibear gains 5% (+ 4% per 100 AP) bonus attack speed per stack, up to 25% (+ 20% per 100 AP).
Lightning Claws: Volibear's claws ignite with lightning, causing his basic attacks on-hit to deal 10+1*x for 3; then + 2*x for 3; then + 3*x for 7; then + 4*xundefined âˆ’ (based on level) (+ 40% AP) bonus magic damage to the target and the closest visible enemy within 450 units of the target, chaining up to 4 subsequent targets.
i1.notes:
* '''Volibear's''' spikes visually grow as ''The Relentless Storm'' stacks.
* ''Lightning Claws'' has no effect on [[structures]] and {{tip|ward|wards}}.
* While at four stacks, the next attack or ability on-hit reaching the fifth stack will be empowered by ''Lightning Claws''.
* A stack of ''The Relentless Storm'' is not gained if the attack is {{tip|dodged}} and/or missed if '''Volibear''' is {{tip|blind|blinded}}. A stack is granted even if the attack is {{tip|blocked}}. In all cases, ''Lightning Claws'' will not apply (on-hit damage is parried and the bounce is prevented).
** Since {{ai|Frenzied Maul|Volibear}} cannot be missed while '''Volibear''' is {{tip|blind|blinded}}, gaining stacks from ''The Relentless Storm'' and applying ''Lighting Claws'' from the ability will not be prevented from that parry effect.
* '''Volibear''' has a hidden passive that grants him {{as|1 armor}} for every enemy {{ci|Zilean}} within 800 range of him.
** Likewise, {{ci|Zilean}} gains {{as|1 ability power}} for every nearby '''Volibear'''.
** Neither '''Volibear''' nor {{ci|Zilean}} need {{tip|sight}} of one another to gain these bonuses.

q1.name: Thundering Smash
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Volibear''' drops on all fours, becoming {{tip|ghosting|ghosted}} and gaining {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for 4 seconds, doubled when moving towards {{tip|sight|visible}} enemy {{tip|champions}} within 2000 units.

For the same duration, '''Volibear's''' next basic attack has an {{tip|uncancelable windup}}, {{tt|{{tip|dash|pounces}} on the target|to 25 to 150 units closer than attack range, if Volibear is not closer already, disabled against jungle monsters}}, deals {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}, and {{tip|stun|stuns}} the target for 1 second.
If '''Volibear''' becomes {{tip|immobilize|immobilized}} by an enemy while ''Thundering Smash'' is active, the effect ends prematurely and the ability's {{sti|cooldown}} is reset.

''Thundering Smash'' {{tip|basic attack reset|resets}} '''Volibear's''' basic attack timer, benefits from {{stil|life steal}} at 100% effectiveness and is affected by {{tip|critical strike}} modifiers.
q1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Volibear drops on all fours, becoming ghosted and gaining bonus movement speed for 4 seconds, doubled when moving towards visible enemy champions within 2000 units.
For the same duration, Volibear's next basic attack has an uncancelable windup, pounces on the target, deals bonus physical damage, and stuns the target for 1 second.
If Volibear becomes immobilized by an enemy while Thundering Smash is active, the effect ends prematurely and the ability's cooldown is reset.
Thundering Smash resets Volibear's basic attack timer, benefits from Unknown value: stil life steal at 100% effectiveness and is affected by critical strike modifiers.
leveling: {{st|Bonus Movement Speed|{{ap|10 to 26}}%|Increased Movement Speed|{{ap|10*2 to 26*2}}%}}
q1.notes:
* ''Thundering Smash's'' empowered attack scales with '''Volibear's''' {{sti|{{as|attack speed}}}}.
* Unlike most spells that empower a basic attack, ''Thundering Smash'' does '''not''' have an increased {{sti|range|attack range}}.
* ''Thundering Smash'' deals {{tip|basic damage}}, but also triggers spell effects by dealing an additional 0 {{tip|spell damage}}.
* ''Thundering Smash'' will still apply its effects to the target even if the {{tip|dash}} is {{tip|interrupt|interrupted}}, but not if he goes into {{tip|resurrection}}.
* ''Thundering Smash'' can {{tip|dash}} over walls provided '''Volibear''' is in attack range of his target on the other side.
* ''Thundering Smash's'' attack triggers against {{tip|turret|structures}} and {{tip|wards}}, consuming the effect but dealing its bonus damage, if applicable.
* The windup for the attack completes even if the target becomes {{tip|untargetable}} but the {{tip|stun}} and damage do not apply.
* ''Thundering Smash's'' reset does not trigger from {{tip|drowsy}} and is only granted after falling {{tip|sleep|asleep}}.
* The [[Summoner|player's]] screen will flash red briefly and cue a sound effect when '''Volibear''' becomes {{tip|immobilize|immobilized}} while ''Thundering Smash'' is active.
* '''Volibear's''' next attack after using ''Thundering Smash'' will come out faster.
* Despite being an empowered attack, ''Thundering Smash'' does not draw minion aggro.{{bug}}

w1.name: Frenzied Maul
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Volibear''' strikes the target enemy, dealing them {{as|physical damage}}, applying {{tip|on-hit}} and {{tip|on-attack}} effects at 100% effectiveness, and ''Wounding'' them for 8 seconds.
Against a ''Wounded'' enemy, '''Volibear''' instead bites the target, dealing {{ccs|50% increased damage|physical}} and {{tip|healing}} himself. The heal is halved against {{tip|minions}}.
''Frenzied Maul'' benefits from {{stil|life steal}} at 100% effectiveness.
w1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Volibear strikes the target enemy, dealing them physical damage, applying on-hit and on-attack effects at 100% effectiveness, and Wounding them for 8 seconds.
Against a Wounded enemy, Volibear instead bites the target, dealing Unknown value: ccs 50% increased damage physical and healing himself. The heal is halved against minions.
Frenzied Maul benefits from Unknown value: stil life steal at 100% effectiveness.
leveling: {{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|10 to 110}} {{as|(+ 100% AD)}} {{as|(+ 6% of his '''bonus''' health)}}|Increased Damage|{{ap|10*1.5 to 110*1.5}} {{as|(+ 150% AD)}} {{as|(+ 9% of his '''bonus''' health)}}}}
{{st|Heal|{{ap|20 to 80}} {{as|(+ {{ap|8 to 16}}% of his '''missing''' health)}}|Minion Heal|{{ap|10 to 40}} {{as|(+ {{ap|4 to 8}}% of his '''missing''' health)}}}}
w1.notes:
* '''Volibear''' will be ordered to [[basic attack]] the target after casting ''Frenzied Maul''.
* ''Frenzied Maul'' deals {{tip|basic damage}}, but also triggers spell effects by dealing an additional 0 {{tip|spell damage}}.
* ''Frenzied Maul's'' bite {{tip|heals}} even if it is blocked by {{tip|spell shield}}.
* ''Frenzied Maul's'' strike can be {{tip|dodged}} and {{tip|blocked}}, but it cannot miss if '''Volibear''' is {{tip|blind|blinded}}. The ''Wound'' mark does not apply if {{tip|dodge|dodged}}, but will otherwise do so regardless.
** The bite can be {{tip|blocked}} but '''Volibear''' still heals. It does not heal nor deal damage if the bite is {{tip|dodged}}. The bite cannot miss if '''Volibear''' is {{tip|blind|blinded}}.
* If the target becomes {{tip|untargetable}}, dies, or '''Volibear''' loses {{tip|sight}} of them during the cast time, ''Frenzied Maul'' does not deal damage nor apply the mark but its {{sti|cooldown}} and {{sti|{{as|mana}}}} are refunded.
* ''Frenzied Maul'' deals bonus damage and heals if the target is still ''Wounded'' after the cast time. If the mark wares off before the cast time completes, the ability's animation will appear as if the bite was applied but there is no bonus damage or heal.
* Despite being single target, ''Frenzied Maul'' does not draw minion aggro.{{bug}}

e1.name: Sky Splitter
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Volibear''' summons a lightning bolt to strike at the target location after a 2-second delay. If '''Volibear''' is within the lightning strike, he {{tip|shields}} himself for {{as|15% of his '''maximum''' health}} {{as|(+ 80% AP)}} for 3 seconds.

The lightning bolt deals {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies struck within the area, capped at 750 against non-champions, {{tip|slow|slows}} them by 40% for 2 seconds, and grants {{tip|sight}} of the area for 1 second.
e1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Volibear summons a lightning bolt to strike at the target location after a 2-second delay. If Volibear is within the lightning strike, he shields himself for 15% of his maximum health (+ 80% AP) for 3 seconds.
The lightning bolt deals magic damage to all enemies struck within the area, capped at 750 against non-champions, slows them by 40% for 2 seconds, and grants sight of the area for 1 second.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|80 to 200}} {{as|(+ 80% AP)}} {{as|(+ {{ap|11 to 15}}% of target's '''maximum''' health)}}}}
e1.notes:
* Enemies cannot see the location of the cast for the first second, but they can already tell that the spell is underway by noticing '''Volibear's''' cast animation.
* '''Volibear''' will receive the {{tip|shield}} even if he is {{tip|untargetable}}.

r1.name: Stormbringer
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Volibear''' gains ''Stormbringer'' for 12 seconds and {{tip|dash|leaps}} to the target location with {{tip|cc-immune|immunity to crowd control}} as well as granting {{tip|sight}} of the area in a 500 radius during the travel.

{{sbc|Stormbringer:}} '''Volibear''' gains {{tip|ghosting}}, {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' health}}}}, {{sti|50 '''bonus''' attack range}}, 25 increased range on {{ai|Frenzied Maul|Volibear}}, and 35% increased [[size]].

'''Volibear''' {{tt|impacts|centered on Volibear's location when the dash ends in any way}} after 1 second, {{tip|slow|slowing}} all enemies in an area by 50%, decaying over 1 second. Enemies in the epicenter are also dealt {{ccs|{{as|physical damage}}|physical}}.
'''Volibear''' also disables enemy {{tip|turrets}} in an area for a few seconds, rendering them unable to attack, as well as dealing them the same {{ccs|{{as|physical damage}}|physical}}.
''Stormbringer will cast at max range if cast beyond that. {{ais|Thundering Smash|Volibear}} duration will be paused for the {{tip|dash|leap}}.''
r1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Volibear gains Stormbringer for 12 seconds and leaps to the target location with immunity to crowd control as well as granting sight of the area in a 500 radius during the travel.
Stormbringer: Volibear gains ghosting, bonus health, 50 bonus attack range, 25 increased range on Frenzied Maul, and 35% increased size.
Volibear impacts after 1 second, slowing all enemies in an area by 50%, decaying over 1 second. Enemies in the epicenter are also dealt physical damage physical">Unknown value: ccs physical damage physical.
Volibear also disables enemy turrets in an area for a few seconds, rendering them unable to attack, as well as dealing them the same physical damage physical">Unknown value: ccs physical damage physical.
Stormbringer will cast at max range if cast beyond that. Thundering Smash's duration will be paused for the leap.
r1.notes:
* ''Stormbringer'' will disable any turret that is not the {{tip|Nexus Obelisk}}, even if it is {{tip|untargetable}}.
** ''Stormbringer'' will not deal damage to untargetable turrets.
* '''Volibear''' grows to his new size over {{fd|1.25}} seconds, starting {{fd|0.25}} seconds after landing, and shrinks back to his normal size over {{fd|0.5}} seconds after ''Stormbinger's'' status ends, respectively.
* '''Volibear''' {{tip|dash|leaps}} over 1 second regardless of distance or {{stil|movement speed}}.
** '''Volibear''' impacts immediately at his current location if ''Stormbringer'' is cast over terrain he cannot pass through (due to not being able to cover the distance required).{{bug}}
* The additional bonuses are granted on-cast.
* The turret disable debuff is named ''Ohmwrecker''.
* Disabling a {{tip|turret}} does not prevent aggro of the current target it is locked onto. The increased turret shot damage from {{ii|Ohmwrecker (Turret Item)|Ohmwrecker}} is also reset.
** Turrets maintain the same targeting behavior even when disabled; damaging an enemy champion will still draw turret aggro. However, if the turret's desired target leaves range or has become an invalid target, it will lock onto the most previous target it was going to attack prior to becoming disabled, or instead, find a new one if that condition is not applicable.
